issue.title: [C++] Support cast-function in Substrait
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16416](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16416). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The cast-function is special in Arrow, because its operation is determined by its output type rather than just by its parameter, and so it requires special handling in Substrait to support it.
